Text: I've been looking at these, and they are quite well done. Would it be possible to upload them as DVD-R, so they may be burned to disk? I have students I'd like to show these to.

Originals are in VHS. There is no dvd version as some material been reclassified and the series are not sold anymore. You can use a dvd converter to burn them on dvd if you wish, the quality is very good for a vhs rip.

rambam1776 ...use convertxtodvd.  I find I can get about 6 hours of video per dvd without it impairing the quality.   http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5577554/ConvertXtoDVD_v4.0.12.327___Serials_%5BChattChitto_RG%5D
Thank you! An excellent summary of the Cold War...all the episodes work and are decent quality.
thanks to the uploader, good find.
